Recep Ivedik (2008 )

Director: Togan Gokbakar
Genre: Comedy
Year of Production: 22 February 2008 (Turkey)
Cast: Sahan Go"kbakar,Fatma Toptas,Vural Buldu,Hakan Akin,Ismail Hakki U"ru"n,Lemi Filozof,Murat Akdag,Zeynep Aydemir
Country: Turkey
Language: Turkish
Runtime: Antalya, Turkey
Company: Aksoy Film
User Rating: 6.0/10 (1,025 votes) <a href="
http://www.imdb.com/title/tt1193516/" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
http://www.imdb.com/title/tt1193516/</a>

Plot: Recep finds a wallet on the street which belongs to a millionaire, and starts his journey to south in order to return it. On his way south, a series of unexpected and funny events occur, but he manages to reach and return the wallet. As a reward, he is offered a free stay in a hotel, but he politely refuses this offer. After seeing his childhood love leaving a tour bus, he changes his mind, and starts trying to gain her back.
